# HUD::END_TEXT_COMMAND_BUSYSPINNER_ON

## Summary
Displays the busy spinner message.

## Parameters
* **INT** icon: 2=Spinner / 4=Star

## Description
<!-- AUTOGENERATED: Remove this line before editing -->
enum eBusySpinnerType
{
	BUSY_SPINNER_LEFT,
	BUSY_SPINNER_LEFT_2,
	BUSY_SPINNER_LEFT_3,
	BUSY_SPINNER_SAVE,
	BUSY_SPINNER_RIGHT,
};
